titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of a Juan Pablo Duarte Day.
Supporting the goals and ideals of a Juan Pablo Duarte Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution supports the establishment of a national day of recognition to honor Juan Pablo Duarte, the founding father of the Dominican Republic, and urges people to observe a national day of recognition for Dominican Americans.
